Package org.openlca.core.matrix

package org.openlca.core.matrix
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    IndexConsumer<T>
    Like the normal consumer function but with an index of the respective object as first argument.
    LinkingCallback
    A LinkingCallback is a function that can be injected into the creation of product systems links to control the linking process.
    MatrixIndex<T>
    Maps a set of instances of a given type to the corresponding rows or columns of a matrix.
    TechLinker
     
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AllocationIndex
    An instances of this class provides fast access to the allocation factors related to the products of a product system.
    CalcAllocationFactor
     
    CalcExchange
     
    CalcImpactFactor
     
    FlowIndex
    The row index $\mathit{Idx}_B$ of the intervention matrix $\mathbf{B}$.
    ImpactBuilder
    Builds the matrices with characterization factors for a given set of flows and LCIA categories.
    ImpactBuilder.Config
     
    ImpactBuilder.ImpactData
    A subset of MatrixData that contains only the LCIA matrix data.
    ImpactIndex
    Maps a set of impact categories to a matrix index.
    IndexedMatrix<R,​C>
     
    IndexedMatrix.Builder<R,​C>
     
    IndexFlow
    Describes the mapping of flow information to a matrix index.
    InventoryBuilder
     
    LinkingConfig
     
    LongIndex
    Maps arbitrary values of type long to an ordinal, zero-based index of type int.
    LongPair
    A LongPair saves just a pair of longs.
    MatrixConfig
     
    MatrixConfig.Builder
     
    MatrixData
    Contains the matrices of that are input of a calculation.
    NwSetTable
    Stores the factors of a normalization and weighting set.
    ParameterTable
    A data structure for fast creation of formula interpreters for the parameters of a database.
    ProcessLinkSearchMap
    This is a data structure for searching a set of existing process links by provider and recipient processes.
    ProcessProduct
    In openLCA, we map the process-product pairs of a product system to the respective rows and columns of the matrices in the inventory model.
    ProductSystemBuilder
    Builds or auto-completes a product system according to a given configuration.
    TechIndex
    The index $\mathit{Idx}_A$ of the technology matrix $\mathbf{A}$ of a product system.
    TechLinker.Default
    The default linker gets the product index of a system (which may be the index of a complete database) and links exchanges by their default providers.
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    LinkingConfig.DefaultProviders
    Indicates how default providers of product inputs or waste outputs should be considered in the linking process.
